full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NYI ZLA GZA' SKAR GYI KHRUS CHOG GTZANG MA'I CHU RGYUN BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (NYI ZLA GZA' SKAR GYI KHRUS MCHOG GTZANG MA @003A *, ,CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SLOB DPON KLU SGRUB KYI MDZAD SROL ZHES GRAGS PA LA GZHIR BYAS NAS, SNANG BRGYAD LAS KHA BSKONG BYAS NAS ZUR BRGYAN TE, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM RNAMS LA PHAN BYUNG NGAM ZHES RANG GIS LHAG BSAM GYIS [???] THA SHAL BA BLO ZHES MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,DMIGS YUL SEMS CAN RNAMS LA BKRA SHIS DANG PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO THOGS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O,, ,,)
